title: Camouflage for iOS
description:
No more fiddling with the markup tool in the Photos app to hide a face. Redact your favorite photos with emojis on iOS and protect the privacy of your loved ones. Camouflage automatically detects faces and overlays it with an emoji!

The app is completely free to use, but you can upgrade to the PRO version which will allow you to hide the little watermark in the bottom right corner + add up to 6 favorite emojis.
This is a one-time payment, all future updates will be free of charge!
